directions: Melt 1 tablespoon buttery spread in a skillet over medium-high heat.  Add chicken and brown, cooking and stirring. Season with Montreal steak seasoning. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside, about 5 minutes. Transfer cooked chicken to a bowl.

Melt remaining tablespoon buttery spread in the skillet. Add sliced mushrooms and garlic; cook and stir until lightly brown, about 2 minutes. Stir in water, lemon juice, and the Knorr(R) Rice Sides(TM) - Herb & Butter.
Bring to a boil over high heat; stir and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer until rice is tender, 7 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in cooked chicken, lemon zest, and avocado.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 teaspoon steak seasoning (such as Montreal Steak Seasoning®)
1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Herb & Butter
title: Sunshine Chicken and Rice
